title: SDLC AI engineering Bootcamp - Week 1
description: Master the fundamentals of AI-accelerated development

days.title: Kickoff + AI Mindset
days.summary: Learn what an AI Engineer is, understand the AI-accelerated SDLC, and set up your development environment

days.title: AI Tools & Prompt Engineering
days.summary: Master AI copilots, learn prompt engineering patterns, and build your first AI-generated component

days.title: Planning & Requirements
days.summary: Create PRDs with AI, break down ideas into tasks, and plan your MVP using AI-assisted planning

days.title: Design & Implementation
days.summary: Build frontend architecture, use AI for design, create components, and deploy preview builds

days.title: Deployment & Reflection
days.summary: Deploy to production, set up CI/CD, document your work, and celebrate your achievements
